resources.string: Simply click on a question to get started!

Hey, it looks like you\'re a frequent user of SQL Practice PRO! If you have a couple seconds, I would be incredibly grateful if you could rate this app in the Play Store. Don\'t worry, I won\'t bother you with this ever again no matter what you choose. Thank you again for even downloading this app to begin with.
